summary: Adds a new Hard Rock Weapon :p
descriptionHtml:
--- Description :

Did you know that Alvor from Riverwood was a true Hard Rock Devil ?

He has a true Fender Stratocaster in his house! You can take it from him if you feel confident enough about stealing his guitar from a tough blacksmith... But you can also forge one of your own!

And don\'t worry if you don\'t know how to play, everyone knows that there are many ways to use an instrument...


--- Features :

- A classic Fender Stratocaster usable as a weapon in Alvor\'s house
- A forge recipe so you can create your own
- A special sound when you equip the weapon ;)


--- Version :

1.0 First mod out !
author: Holysh
